title: CodePen
description: CodePen, a vibrant online community and platform for front-end developers, showcases a colorful palette that embodies creativity and innovation. Known sources of inspiration include their official branding and user-generated content, reflecting hues like cyan (#0EBEFF), vibrant green (#47CF73), lively purple (#AE63E4), bright yellow (#FCD000), striking red (#FF3C41), and sky blue (#76DAFF) found on their official site and resources.
